Marmot - an energy modelling results visualization tool¶

Marmot is a data formatting and visualization tool for PLEXOS production cost modelling results. It provides and efficient way to view PLEXOS results by combing temporally disaggregated results and allowing teh aggregation of different device types and modelling region.

Marmot has approximately 100 pre-built plots which allow significant customization to allow a user to create publication figures and data-tables fast.

If you are a new Marmot user, check out the Get Started section of the documentation for installation instructions and introductory tutorials. For more in depth explanations of various operations and details on Marmot, read our How-to Guides. If you would like to see some example plot outputs, they can be viewed in the Plotting Examples Gallery.
